channel.title: Facade - Lucid Dreams (WIP) (Can I have some feedback?)
channel.description:
so i’m remaking the song “lucid dreams” by juice wrld and i want some feedback... it’s still not even close to being finished, i just want to know what i need to improve
here’s the link: https://soundcloud.com/facade-music-etc/lucid-dreams-wip/s-AuvJ8

item.title: Facade - Lucid Dreams (WIP) (Can I have some feedback?)
item.dc:creator: Jax
item.description:
I really liked the drop, the only feedback I have is that you may want to change up the timing for some of the notes on the lead after the drop. Some felt a little awkward, but that might just be me.

Read full topic

item.title: Facade - Lucid Dreams (WIP) (Can I have some feedback?)
item.dc:creator: corey
item.description:
During the fade in, I’d love some v subtle hints at what’s coming. A note on the one every four measures or something, just to keep it moving.

Once it drops, it’s really nice! I’d like a weightier bottom end - maybe long notes on a sub once a measure - and I’m definitely looking for a variation by 1:07 after the first break. You could move the melody down an octave so that you could move it back up again after another 16, or something.

Just some ideas. It’s a great start!

Read full topic
